00031 class Reference {
00032 private:
00034      static const Reference sRoot;
00035 
00037      static const Reference sNull;
00038 
00040      const std::string mName;
00041 
00043      const Reference* mScope;
00044 
00049      mutable std::map<const std::string, const Reference*> mChildren;
00050 
00057      Reference(const std::string &name) : mName(name), mScope(0) {}
00058 
00066      Reference(const Reference& scope, const std::string& name)
00067           : mName(name), mScope(&scope) {}
00068      Reference(const Reference& ref);
00069      ~Reference();
00070      
00071 public:
00077      const std::string& name() const { return mName; }
00078 
00084      const Reference* scope() const { return mScope; }
00085 
00091      static const Reference& root() { return sRoot; }
00092 
00098      static const Reference& nullRef() { return sNull; }
00099 
00100      static void cleanUp();
00101 
00102      static const Reference& get(const DOMElement* n);
00103      static const Reference& get(const Reference& scope, const std::string& name);
00104 
00121      bool operator < (const Reference& r) const {
00122           // Equal scopes => return true of this name is less than r's name.
00123           if (mScope == r.mScope) {
00124                return (mName < r.mName);
00125           }
00126           // Basis case - one of the scopes is null, e.g. either this
00127           // or r is the root Reference and thus the 'smallest' Reference.
00128           else if (mScope == 0 || r.mScope == 0) {
00129                return (mScope == 0);
00130           }
00131           // Else just compare this Reference to r's scope Reference.
00132           else {
00133                return (*mScope < *r.mScope);
00134           }
00135      }
00136 
00146      bool operator == (const Reference& r) const { return (this == &r); }
00147 
00154      bool operator != (const Reference& r) const { return !(*this == r); }
00155 
00163      std::ostream& toXML(std::ostream& o) const { return toXML(o, ""); }
00164      std::ostream& toXML(std::ostream& o, std::string indent) const;
00165      
00167      friend std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& o, const Reference& r);
00168 };
00169 
00177 struct lessReferenceP {
00186      bool operator()(const Reference *const r1, const Reference *const r2) const {
00187           if (!r1 || !r2) {
00188                exit(1);
00189           }
00190           else {
00191                return (*r1 < *r2);
00192           }
00193      }
00194 };
00195 
00203 struct hashReferenceP {
00213      size_t operator()(const Reference *const key) const {
00214           return reinterpret_cast<size_t>(key);
00215      }
00216 };
